# Load CSV Data

```{r}
#install.packages("readr")
#install.packages("dplyr")
library(readr)
library(dplyr)

student_satisfaction <- read.csv("student_satisfaction.csv")
```

# Change Blank Cells to NA

```{r}

student_satisfaction <- student_satisfaction %>% 
  mutate_all(na_if, "")
```
